E son diversificadas las specias de fractura del os en lor meteyssas; quar es fayta fractura arcuada otra aquo que accidan en lu stellas; e alcunas veguadas es fayta fractura segon la longitut del os: e so las fracturas de lu satagia e astelhas e addicios procedentz e no-procedentz, ayssi cum es fayt en la pena quan es preparada a escriure, e es fractura am plagua e disrupcio en le cap, e es fractura fissura petita.	There are various types of bone fractures in their cases; some are arcuate fractures, others occur in the stars; and some are longitudinal fractures: and some are fractures of the skull and stars and addictions that proceed and do not proceed, as is done in the pen when it is prepared to write, and the fracture is a plague and disruption in the head, and the fracture is a small fissure.
E a tota specia es engen o turment propri en restauracio de lu segon que vindra rememoracio de lu distincta en les sieus locs.	And in all cases, there is a particular torment in the restoration of it according to what will come from the distinct remembrance of it in its places.
Mota senhal de fractura del os.	Great shock of bone fracture.
E per aquo es conoguda fractura del os: es tortuositat de lu, e de aquel eminencia e appericio de lu al sentiment, e so de lu quan compremes aquel am la tua ma.	And for that reason, bone fracture is known as: the twisting of it, and its elevation and appreciation to the sensation, and some are from the hand at your touch.
E donc quan no es en le loc tortuositat apparent ni so no es feyt deves le tieu tocament quan toques le os am agitacio e le malaute no atroba gran dolor, lahoras no es aqui fractura.	And therefore, when there is no twisting in the place and it is not made by your touch when you touch the bone in its movement and the patient does not have great pain, then it is not a fracture here.
Habantz es possible que sia tortuositat o petita fissura, adon no cove que tu mauguas aquel am la tua ma e am compressio de tot; habantz pausa sobre lu de las medicinas de las quals ve rememoracio aprop aquel moment le qual conveneys al loc; e aprop sia streyt per strictura subtil.	It is possible that there is twisting or a small fissure, where you may not be able to place your hand and compress everything; then pause over the area of the medicines of which you remember at that moment; and then keep it straight by a subtle constriction.

You should know that when the place is curved and does not split into two or another, what does not happen in the same part of the body, as it is remembered from the whole part of the patient, then you should begin to correct the hand that happened to the apostema caut.

And if an apostema caut happens, then leave that for a few days until it ceases; and then gently move the hand in any way you can with lifting and twisting.

E aprop strenh aquel segon que vindra la rememoracio de lu.	And then strengthen that which will come after the remembrance of the hand.
Mays si en le os so satagias, lahoras es necessaria extencio de aquest membre trencat de doas partz, si es la ma o le pe; o am la tua ma si le membre es petit; o am doas cordas o am una corda e la ma. And if your position is such that you place the member in the same way as its natural figure, while the parts of the broken member are extended, then pierce those attachments with a needle and return them to their places according to each method that you can find in their locations.

And be careful not to injure the patient with your operation or their injury; and pierce them according to your power that you apply the one bone to the other as a companion according to the best forms.

And approach the appropriate position and proper operation and stricture of that member, and rest and tranquility; advise the patient about this and make sure he does not move that part in the hour of his vigils and sleep, and observe his movement and agitation, and control his excretion, and control all his movements with all his virtue; and wait until the position of the member is a position in which the pain is secure, which causes the pain when it is in the position of the member's disposition; then change that to another position of which he does not feel pain; and guard that that position of yours that member is straight and equal, so that the member does not suffer tortuosity when it is restored.

And the quality of the member's stricture is that which I recommend; so that you know that twisted members vary in their position and size and in the shape of those.

When those who are obese have them with a cushion or a pillow, cover them with a cloth that is thick and durable, because the softness of the cloth connects the large member strongly to all parts, equally preventing any injury.
E aprop comensa, aprop la tua evacuacio de equacio, pausar liament convenient ad aquo, sobre le loc de aquela fractura am tres envolucios o quatre segon que·l membre mereys; e strenh la tua ma un petit am le liament.	And then, begin your evacuation of equality, place a suitable bandage over the location of that fracture, with three or four layers on the member as soon as it becomes soft; and strengthen your hand a little to hold the bandage.

And then, approach that to the most elevated part of the location of the fracture, and strengthen your hand so that it does not break the structure that you have strengthened at the location of the fracture.
E aprop elongua te am envolucio del loc de la fractura un pauc, e mollifiqua la strictura petit a petit, entro que prenguas del loc sa una gran partida.	And then, lengthen your hand slightly into the covering of the location of the fracture, and gradually soften the structure little by little, until you feel a large part of it.
E aprop pren una autra benda e envolveys aquela autra veguada sobre le loc trenquat am envolucio, e aprop ve am las envolucios a la partida pus dejos de la fractura; e sia la tua operacio en la strictura de la envolucio e en mollificacio de aquela segon que havem dit en la envolucio primieyra desus.	And then, take another bandage and wrap it around the other wound over the location of the fracture, and approach your operation to the structure of the covering and the softening of that second one which we have said in the first covering.
E aprop pausa entre las volucios de stopa leon o drap am le qual sia engualada la tortuositat de la fractura, si en lu es tortuositat; e sino, no pauses en lu alcuna causa.	And if there is a curvature between the toes of the lion or the cloth that equals the tortuosity of the fracture, if there is tortuosity in it; otherwise, do not place anything on it for any reason.

Empero cove que la astelha que es pausada sobre aquela fractura sia pus grossa e pus lada un petit que las autras astelhas, e la longitut de la stela segon qu’es legut al membre en magnitut e parvitat; e aprop strenh sobre las astelhas am autra benda segon la tua primieyra strictura; e aprop lia desus am fiel decentment segon que havem dit de strictura, e es que sia la tua strictura segon le loc de la fractura mes, e quant mes es alonguat de la fractura, es mendre la strictura.	However, make sure that the sheet placed over the fracture is thicker and longer than the other sheets, and let the length of the sheet be according to its length and thickness; and strengthen it with another band according to your first structure; and let the layer above be made decently as we have said about the structure, and that your structure should be according to the location of the fracture and the longer it is, the stronger the structure.
E cove que les fils sian migiers en grossesa e subtilitat, e sian de li mol; e si les fils so grosses, ayssi cum yeu he vist per la operacio de alcus fols pausantz les lors fils de cordas de li tort, e es error gran, quan catz la strictura fora equalitat.	And it is important that the threads be smooth and thin, and of good quality; and if the threads are thick, as she has seen in the operation of removing a cataract by pulling the thick threads of the eye, and this is a great error when the stricture is equal.
E eyssament fils subtils no so convenientz, quar tu no consaguiras per strictura am aquels aquo que voles, e no cove que entre astela e astela haja mens de un dit.	And very thin threads are not convenient, because you will not be able to sew through the stricture with those that you want, and it is not good if there is a gap between each stitch.
E si le malaute es ledit per las extremitatz de las stelas aprop la strictura en les locs sas, lahoras pausa dejos aquelas de stopa leon o lana carmenada entro que aquo no li fassa lesio.	And if the patient is sewn up near the stricture with the ends of the needles in the wrong places, then pause and place a piece of leather or carmined wool between them to prevent injury.
Alcunas veguadas fractura es am plagua, e accideys disrupcio en la codena, e yeu vindre am rememoracio en aquela en le capitol segon singularitat.	Some fractures are caused by blows, and some occur in the spine, and she has found them to be remembered in that one in the second chapter of singularity.
E sapias que ges tot membre trencat no es streyt am stelhas al primier dia; la qual causa es quar le membre, quan es gran, no cove que pauses sobre lu stelhas sino aprop v dias o vii o mays, segon la tua seguratat de adveniment de apostema caut.	And you should know that all broken bones are not immediately straightened on the first day; the reason for this is that the bone, when it is large, does not allow to be placed over the needles sooner than five or seven days, according to your certainty of the occurrence of an abscess.
E aquesta es la manieyra dels emplaustres am les quals les Antics restauravan, les quals so pausatz sobre fractura e dislocacio e torcio.	And this is the method of bandages used by ancients to treat fractures, dislocations, and sprains.
Manieyra de emplaustra comu abruejat de restaurament de fractura, convenient a motas compleccios e majorment a las femnas e als efantz, quar es de aquo sobre le qual no ventz calor ni freg: e es que prenguas de polvera de moli, e es la medula de la farina que pen deves le movement de la mola en las paretz del moli.	The method of bandaging for the treatment of fractures, which is most suitable for complex cases and especially for women and children, where no heat or moisture is required: you should take powdered flour, and the middle part of the flour that can prevent the movement of the bone in the parts of the mold.
E comfeys aquel ayssi cum es, sino que cribelles aquel am album de huou, e pausa la comfeccio de lu no-spessa ni subtil; e aprop usa de aquela.	And if it is like that, you should crumble that bread into the wound, and place the compresses on it, which are not too thick or thin; and then use that.
Autra manieyra de emplaustre restaurant fractura e dislocacio e torcio: recipe de assafetida, de lapdanum, de acacia, de enula, e migrach, que es razit de milgraner salvage, de totz ana drac. x; de mirra e aloen ana drac. v; alochil ana drac. xx; totz sian trissatz e cribellatz e sian mesclatz am aygua alichil o am album de huou si la compleccio del malaute es scalfada; e aprop usa de aquest emplaustre, quar es de bona composicio e restaura les osses trencatz leugierament, e confereys a motz homes.	Another method of bandage for treating fractures, dislocations, and sprains: recipe of asafetida, of lavender, of acacia, of aloe, and of myrrh, which is made from milkweed salt, of all one drachm. x; of manna and aloe one drachm v; alochil one drachm xx; all mixed with oil or bread if the wound of the patient is scalded; and then use this bandage, which is of good composition and restores the broken bones more quickly, and confers strength to many people.

Las specias de fracturas son motas, e las figuras de lor son diversas, e las causas son distinctas, quar de fracturas alcuna es fayta per percussio de spaza, e la percussio osta tot le os entro al ciphac, le qual es dejos le os, ayssi cum fay ayssa en le fust, e per aquo aquesta specia es nompnada ascial; o la spaza inscideys alcuna partida del os, e inscideys la carn de lu e no passa la inscizio entro al derier de lu; e aquesta specia de fractura es nompnada levatio absoluta.	The species of fractures are different, and their figures are diverse, and their causes are distinct, because some fractures are caused by the impact of a space, and the impact is throughout the bone, which is located behind the bone, just like it happens in the staff, and for that reason this type is called an "ascial"; or the space penetrates into one part of the bone, and penetrates into its flesh and does not pass through the entire back of it; and this type of fracture is called absolute elevation.

E guarda te segon la tua vertut que la plagua en la tua curacio sia neta; e no sia en lu surdicia de enguent ni autra; ni no layssas agreguar virulencia en lu; quar quan es ajustada sobre le pannicol del cervel, corromp aquel e poyreys aquel, e accideys sobre le malaute aprop aquo malicia maligna.	And guard yourself the second that the wound in your cure is not infected; and it is not in the surdity of poison or other; nor do you let it aggregate virulence in it; because when it is adjusted on the panniculus of the brain, it corrupts that and pollutes that, and it happens to the patient aforementioned that malicious malice.
E accideys en le ciphac del cap, cum de lu es mondificat le os e majorment quan es menspresada la cura de lu, e es negror en la superficia de lu; e donc considera lahoras si accideys al malaute les accidentz que havem ditz, sapias que es parnicios ses tot dopte.	And it happens in the cerebral cortex, where from there the bone is formed and more when it is pressed on its cure, and it becomes black on the surface of it; and therefore consider that if it happens to the patient these accidents that we have said, know that it is paranoid.
E si no accideys negror sino de la medicina que es pausada desus, e es en vertut de aquela medicina que fassa aquela negror, lahoras cove que tu prenguas de mel una partida e de oli rozat partidas iii, e am aquels linieys un drap, e aprop pausa aquel sobre le ciphac; e aprop cura aquel am las specias de curacio que conveneys entro que sia sanat.	If no black magic is involved in the medicine that is placed above, and it is due to the power of that medicine that it cures the black magic, then you should take a piece of honey and four pieces of oiled cloth, and place them on that part; and then cover that with a cloth, and care for that with the appropriate treatment until it is healed.
Capitol .iii.	Chapter III.
De restauracio del nas quan es trincat.	About the restoration of the nose when it is broken.
Sapias que no es trencat del nas sino doas partidas ensemps pus sobiranas, o una de aquelas alcunas veguadas, per so quar en lu has dos osses, quar la partida dejos es cartillaginosa, e no es trencada e no accideys a lu sino atricio e tortuositat e sinuitat.	You should know that the nose is not broken into two parts, but rather into four parts, somewhat closer together, or one of those curved ones, because there are two bones in it, and the part that is left is cartilaginous, and it is not broken, but only bent and twisted and swollen.
Mays si es trencada la una de las doas partidas de lu, lahoras cove que tu intrometas le dit petit en le sieu nas, e que engualhas aquela fractura dedintz am le tieu dit indic, e am le dit pous defora, entro que retorne le nas segon la sua figura natural.	If one of the two parts is broken, then you should introduce a small splint into that part of the nose, and equalize that fracture by means of the two splints, and then cover it with the appropriate treatment until the nose returns to its natural shape.
E sia fayt aquo per tu am facilitat, e guarda te que no caja per aquela tua operacio sobre le malaute delor.	And do this to help you, and be careful not to cause harm to the patient during your operation.
E si la fractura es en la pus sobirana partida del nas, e le dit no perve ad aquela, lahoras cove que sia equat am la extremitat del ray en le qual sia petita grossitut.	And if the fracture is in the upper part of the nose, and it does not allow for vision, then cover it with a small, round bandage.
E si la fractura es en doas partidas, lahoras tu fay le semblant de aquo.	And if the fracture is in two parts, then do the same thing.
E coyta te am restauracio de lu en le primier dia de la fractura, si es possible; e sino, lahoras aprop le vii o·l x deves le repaus del apostema caut.	And cover the wound with a bandage for its restoration on the first day after the fracture, if possible; otherwise, then apply the seventh or tenth day to heal the abscess cautiously.
E aprop entromet en la extremitat del nas una meca de drap de li, si la fractura es en una partida, o metz doas calguas, si la fractura es en doas partidas, e sia en la calgua grossitut de tanta quantitat que umpla le trauc del nas.	And insert a piece of cloth into the end of the nose, if the fracture is in one part, or two splints, if the fracture is in two parts, and let them fill the nostril.
E diysso alcus dels antics restauradors que las calguas sian enfundudas en boder, e sian permudadas en tot dia, mays no es vist a mi; habantz cove que la meca sia enfunduda en album de huou comfit am polvera de moli; e aprop layssa la qualgua entro que l’os sia fermat e sia endurazida la cartillage.	And say to the ancient healers that the splints should be wrapped in cloth, and moved around the entire day, but not seen by me; having covered the piece with a piece of linen cloth mixed with powdered myrrh; and then leave it until the bone is stopped and the cartilage is strengthened.
E alcunas veguadas sia entromes en le nas, en loc de calgua, pena de auca pus que es envolopada de drap de li leon; e sia que ja te la fractura del nas pus vehement e que le malaute no sia prohibit de inspiracio.	And some bandages should be placed in the nose, in place of a gag, or else they would be wrapped in cloth from the lion's mane; and that the fracture of the nose is more violent and that the patient should not be prohibited from inspiration.
E aquesta causa no es a tu necessaria; e si voles, fay aquo, e si voles, fay calguas.	And this cause is not necessary for you; and if you want, do that, and if you want, make bandages.
E si accideys autra veguada apostema caut, emplastra le nas am cerot o am coto enfus en vi agre e oli rozat, o am diaquilon.	And if another bandage causes an abscess, apply a plaster to the nose with beeswax or with a solution of egg yolk and rose oil, or with diachylon.
Mays si no accideys apostema caut, lahoras cove que emplaustres aquel defora am farina de sizami e am polvera de enses cofitz am album de huou; e aprop pausa sobre lu stopa leon, e no lies le nas am alcuna causa.	However, if no abscess occurs, then cover that deformed part with a plaster made of starch and powdered alum, and place it on the lion's mane, and do not leave the nose uncovered for any reason.
Mays si so trencats les osses del nas am fractura petita o so conminuitz, lahoras cove que scindas sobre aquels, e extraguas aquels am insturmentz que conveno ad aquels; e aprop cos la scissura, e cura aquela am aquo que encarna e consolida, e am emplastres ad aquo convenientz.	However, if the bones of the nose are broken or comminuted due to a small fracture, then cover those, and remove those with instruments that are appropriate for them; and place this laceration, and heal it with what encases and consolidates, and with plasters that are appropriate.
E si accideys plagua dedintz le nas, lahoras cove que cures aquela am calguas e administra canulas de plom entro que sia de tot sanat.	If there is a nosebleed, then apply pressure to the nostrils and administer a plaster of gum into it until it stops bleeding.
Capitol .iiii.	Chapter IV.
De restauracio de la mandibula quan es trincada.	On the restoration of the jaw when it is dislocated.
Quan la mandibula dejos es rompuda e la fractura de lu no es am plagua, reguarda lahoras si la fractura es deforas tant solament, e no es trencada en dos e es curvada a las partidas dedintz, lahoras la sua cognicio es leugiera.	When the jaw is broken and the fracture does not bleed, look at whether the fracture is only slightly deformed and not completely separated into two pieces and curved to the parts inside, then it can be easily treated.
E cove donc, si la fractura es en la part dreyta, que tu intrometas le tieu indic senestre en la boca del malaute; e semblantment si la fractura es an la mandibula senestra, lahoras intromet le dit indic de la ma dreyta; e impelleys am aquel la gilbositat de la fractura dedintz am facilitat a las partidas defora, am la tua autra ma de la partida defora del os; am aquel decentment equa aquelam.	And therefore, if the fracture is in the middle, then introduce your finger from the patient's mouth on the right side of the jaw; and similarly, if the fracture is on the right side of the jaw, then introduce your finger from the patient's mouth on the left side; and push it against the softness of the fracture inside to facilitate the deformed parts, with your other hand on the part of the deformed bone; and hold it in place.
E si la fractura de la mandibula ja es separada en doas, lahoras cove que administres extensio de doas partz segon rectitut entro que sia possibla la equacio de lu.	And if the fracture of the jaw is already separated into two pieces, then apply traction to the two parts in a straight line until it is possible to realign them.
E si accideys conmocio de dentz a disrupcio, lahoras strenh aquelas de las quals speras que romandran am fil de aur o de argent o de ceda; e aprop pausa sobre la mandibula trencada cerot, e aprop pausa sobre lu drap duplicat, e pausa sobre le drap gran stelha decentment fayta, o una pessa de sola engual a la longitut de la mandibula; e aprop lia aquela desus segon que a tu es apparelhada la liadura de lu e que conveneys la applicacio, entro que no es destruida.	And if there is a dislocation of teeth to fracture, then use those that you hope will remain intact, such as gold or silver or cedar; and place them over the broken jaw, and place them over the doubled cloth, and place a large steady sheet decently made, or a weight equal to the length of the jaw; and hang it above second according to what you have prepared for its application, until it is not destroyed.
E comanda al malaute que use de repaus e tranquilitat, e pausa la vianda de lu sorbicios leons.	And command the patient to use rest and tranquility, and place a lemon on his lips.
E si extimas que ja es alterada la figura en alcuna manieyra, lahoras tu te coyta e deslia aquel al tertz dia; e aprop rectifica aquo que ja es alterat de lu e emplaustra aquel am polvera de moli, am album de huou, o am farina de cisami, pus que tu auras ostat le cerot de lu, e pausa sobre le emplastra lana leon.	And if you suspect that the figure has been altered in some way, then on the third day you should remove and discard it; and apply what has been altered from it with plaster of moli, album of egg, or cornstarch, so that you have the cedar of the patient, and place a lion's wool over the plaster.
E adonc cum sta annex e ajustat aquel emplastre sobre lu, e la disposicio del os no es alterada, layssa aquel, que no le deslies entro que sia sanat e strenh la fractura; quar motas veguadas aquesta fractura es streyta en tres sempmanas.	And then with this annex and adjust that plaster on it, and the position of the bone is not altered, leave it until it is healed and strong the fracture; because this fracture is strictly in three months.
E si autra veguada accida apostema caut, lahoras administra aquo que havem dit motas veguadas en la sedacio de lu entro que sia sanat, e sia remaugut aquel apostema.	And if another complication occurs, such as an abscess, then administer the same remedies we mentioned in the treatment of that wound, and it will remain healed.
E si la fractura es am plagua, lahoras considera si es pessa del os separada o satagias, lahoras tu te subtilia que ostes aquelas satagias am aquo que conveneys ad aquo en la remocio de aquelas dels sturmentz.	And if the fracture is severe, consider whether the bone has separated or is displaced. If it has, then carefully remove those displaced fragments with instruments that are appropriate for that purpose.
E si le orrifici de la plagua es streyt, lahoras tu le amplifique am le fleubotomi segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat.	And if the orifices of the wound are narrow, then enlarge them with a bodkin according to your need.
E aprop quan tu auras ostat aquelas satagias, e de aquelas no sira remaugut re, lahoras tu cos le orrifici de la plagua si es ampla; e sino, pausa sobre aquela un dels emplaustres que conveneysso ad aquo e encarnan aquela, entro que sia sanada.	And after you have removed those displaced fragments and they do not remain in place, then enlarge the orifices of the wound if they are wide; otherwise, place one of the appropriate dressings over that area and keep it there until it is healed.
Capitol .v.	Chapter V.
De restauracio de la furcula quan es trinquada.	On the restoration of the scapula when it is fractured.
Motas veguadas es trencada la furcula de la partida denant deves le muscle, e aquela fractura es fayta en una de tres manieyras.	The scapula is broken in the middle of the part where it is attached to the shoulder muscle, and that fracture occurs in one of three ways.
Quar o es trencada, o seperada, o es seperada en doas partz otra que no accidan satagias; e es leugier a la restauracio de lu; o es ayssi que accideysso en lu satagias, e es dificil a restauracio de lu; o es ayssi que la fractura es am plagua.	When the bone is broken, or separated, or separated into two parts that do not match; and it is more difficult for its restoration; or if there are any complications in the surrounding area, and it is difficult to restore; or if the fracture is complex.
E la operacio en aquela, quan la fractura es ses plagua, es que tu fassas esser present dos ministres, per so que la un tengua le adjutori e siegua la furcula trencada, e l’autre extenda le col ves aquela partida.	And the operation in this case, when the fracture is complex, is to have two assistants, so that one holds the helper and follows the broken clavicle, and the other stretches the neck towards that part.
E aprop enguala la fractura am les tieus ditz entro que sia fayta la forma de lu segon que cove, e no sia en lu eminencia pauca ni concavitat.	And then align the fracture with the shoulders until it is made in the shape of the second rib, and not in the elevation or concavity.
E si indigeysses mes de extencio, lahoras cove que pauses dejos le titillic del malaute spera de drap o de lana, e sia la grandesa de lu segon la quantitat de la tua necessitat; e exten e eleva la furcula e coarta la spera am la tua ma entro que enguales la frectura segon que cove.	And if more extension is needed, then cover it with cloth or wool, and make it according to the amount of your need; extend and elevate the clavicle and tie it with your hand until the fracture is aligned as desired.
E si no podes atirar la extremitat de la furcula a las partidas defora, per so quar es pervenguda al preon, lahoras cove que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sua cervitz, e pauses sobre le muscle de lu un coyssi migier en grandeza.	And if you cannot tie the end of the clavicle to the parts forward, so that it does not reach the shoulder, then have the patient lie on their back, and place a pillow of appropriate size over the muscle.
E le ministre prema le muscle de lu a las partidas dejos entro que l’os de la furcula sia elevat que es en le preon en sus, e lahoras tu rectifique la fractura e enguala aquela am les tieus ditz.	And the assistant will take the muscle of the patient to the parts that have been entered before the bone of the furcula is raised to be in the position on him, and then you will correct the fracture and equal it to those called the ties.
Mays si sentes satagias de la furcula e so maugudas, lahoras cove que fendes sobre aquela e extraguas aquelas satagias am facilitat.	If you feel pain in the furcula and its muscles, then cover that and remove those pains with ease.
E si es retenguda en le os, lahoras tu ingenia inscisio de lu am un dels inscissoris les quals has apparelhatz ad aquo, pus que havias pausat dejos la furcula le sturment que serve le ciphac; e es sturment de fust o de ferr del qual aquesta es la forma de lu:	And if it is held in the bone, then you will make an incision on that with one of the scissors that you have prepared for this, since you have placed under the furcula the instrument that serves the chisel; and this instrument is a hammer or an iron of which this is the shape of it:
E es semblant a culier del qual aquesta es la concavitat; e sia la sua latitut segon aquo que has necessitat de lu, segon la grandeza del os o la pauqueza de lu.	And it is similar to a mallet of which this is the concavity; and its width is according to that which you have needed from it, according to the size of the bone or the weakness of it.
Mays la longitut de lu sia segon que es a tu possible a la operacio; que haja doas extremitatz ayssi cum vezes, e la una extremitat sia ample e l’autre streyta.	If the length of it is according to what is possible to the operation; that there should be two extremities there, and one extremity should be wide and the other narrow.
E si la disrupcio de la plagua la qual has inscidida quan has extraytas la satagia del os es ampla, e yest segur de apostema caut, lahoras tu ajusta las doas labias de la plagua am sutura.	If the disruption of the wound that you have incised when you extracted the bone's suture is wide, and it is certain of abscess formation, then adjust the two lips of the wound with stitches.
E si la disrupcio es pauca, o temes apostema caut, lahoras tu uemple la plagua am draps e pulvils segon la quantitat de la scissura de la plagua.	If the disruption is narrow, or you fear abscess formation, then you fill the wound with gauze and powders according to the amount of the wound's incision.
E si accideys apostema caut, lahoras infon drap en vi agre e oli rozat e vi, e pausa sobre aquel.	If an abscess forms, then pour in warm water mixed with rose oil and vinegar, and place it over the affected area.
Mays la strictura del os quan es ses plagua e ses seccio, es que pauses emplastre fayt de farina de moli am album de huou, e pausa sobre lu stopa leon, e aprop pausa la spera dejos le titillic de lu, si indigeyssas de aquela, e aprop pren humemate, so es torca la qual teno les Sarrazis , que sia mot longua, e sia latitut de lu de un palm o entorn aquel; e aprop pausa pulvils duplicatz sobre la stopa e l’emplastre; e aprop pren una stela de taula subtil de la qual la latitut d’ela sia de tres ditz e en longitut semblantment; e aprop envolopa aquela en drap, e aprop envolopa aquel drap am la stela en lo loc sobre le loc de la fractura; e aprop pausa humemati ayssi cum es revout, e revol aquela sobre le col de lu e dejos le titillic de lu sa e dejos le titillic de lu malaute, e reduzeys aquela sobre tota partida, e quan vezes que la strictura de la fractura am strictura descent, e es aquo que no es occultat sobre tu.	When the bone is exposed to wound and incision, place a poultice made of flour of mold mixed with egg white on it, and place it over the affected area, covering the tissue of the foot, if necessary, and then apply warm water soaked in linen cloth that has been used by Saracens, which should be long and wide enough to cover the entire foot; and then place powdered starch on the poultice and the cloth; and then place a thin, flexible tablecloth over the affected area, and then wrap the draped cloth around the tablecloth in the location of the fracture; and then apply warm water as it evaporates, and roll the cloth around the neck of the foot and behind the tissue of the foot, and reduce it to cover all parts, and when the bone's exposure decreases, and this is not hidden from you.
E tot, que no sia mauguda la stelha desobre le os trencat; e per so cove que tu vejas le malaute quascun dia, que quan le liament es mollificat o vezas la stela ja esser remauguda, lahoras tu rectifica aquo e strenh la liadura.	And even if the splint above the broken bone is not well-fitted; and so that you can see the patient every day, when the bandage is softened or you replace the splint, then you should adjust it and strengthen the bandage.
E aprop pausa le dormir del malaute sobre le col de lu, e pausa dejos le titillic de lu deves le dormir de lu en la nueyt un petit coyssi; per so que am aquel sia elevat le adjutori de lu del latz de aquel, e donc es elevada la la fractura de la furcula a elevacio del muscle; o sia le bras de lu liat al col de aquel.	And then place the patient's pillow on their shoulder, and place another pillow behind their back to support their back in bed at night; so that the helper can elevate the patient from the side of that person, and thus raise the fracture of the sternum at elevation of the muscle; or the arm of the patient is placed on the shoulder of that person.
E no deslies le liament si no accideys en le loc prusiment o apostema, entro a xii dias.	And do not remove the bandage unless there is an abscess in the place within twelve days.
E aprop renovelha le emplastre si has vista la facia de lu ad aquo, e ajusta en la strictura e restaura aquel e layssa entro que sia restaurat e sia coagulat la fractura de la furcula.	And then renew the plaster if you have seen the surface of the patient at that time, and adjust it in the fracture and restore it until it is restored and the fracture of the sternum has coagulated.
E es strenguda e comfortada segon le mes en xxviii dias, e alcunas veguadas en alcus homes es fayt en mens de temps de aquel.	And it is strengthened and made more comfortable according to the measure in twenty-eight days, and some treatments are done in men of that time.
Capitol .vi.	Chapter 6.
De restauracio de fractura de la spalla.	Of the restoration of a broken shoulder.
Spatula tart es trencada en le loc lat de lu e no so trencatz de lu sino les marges.	The spatula is broken on the side of the shoulder, but it is not broken through the shoulder, only its edges.
E donc quan es trencat le loc de lu — e es trencat en le mieg loc de lu — e no es conogut sino per tocament, lahoras segon que es la figura de la fractura sforsa te la preparacio de lu e reduzir aquela segon la figura natural en tota manieyra de engen la qual es a tu possible.	And when the shoulder is broken — and it is broken in the middle of the shoulder — and it is not known except by touch, then according to the shape of the fracture, prepare the shoulder and reduce it to its natural shape in any way possible.
E aprop pausa sobre le loc polvera de moli am album de huou e stopa leon; e aprop pausa pulvil de drap duplicat; e aprop pausa sobre lu stela lada de taula subtil segon la quantitat de la spatula tota o mays un pauc.	And then place powdered flour of almond milk and stopper on the shoulder; and then place pulverized cloth doubled over; and then place a thin layer of table salt according to the amount of the spatula or more than a small amount.
Mays si dejos la stela es concavitat en alcu dels locs de la spatula, lahoras tu enguala aquela concavitat am stopa leon, e aprop pueja la stela segon equalitat.	If the layer is concave in any part of the spatula, then level that concavity with stopper and press the layer evenly.
E aprop strenh desus am humemati longua ab constriccio decent e am fermesa de la stela entro que no sia remauguda del sieu loc.	And then apply strength above the stopper with a long needle and firmly fix the layer until it does not remain in its place.
E considera le liament en quascun dia; e totas veguadas que sia mollificat, lia autra veguada e stren le e equa la stela si es remauguda del sieu loc.	And consider the ligament in each day; and all the times that it is softened, tie another bandage and strengthen it and straighten the leg if it remains in its place.
E jagua le malaute sobre le sieu latz sa.	And place the patient on their left side.
E la spatula es restaurada en xx dias o en .xxv.	And the splint is restored in 10 days or in .25.
E donc quan es complit aquest nombre, lahoras tu dissolveys le liament, e que tu scias ensegurat quar aquela es dels osses dels quals la cominicio no es temuda ni lor dissolucio.	And then when this number is completed, then you dissolve the bandage, and you know that it is from the bones of which the beginning was not feared nor their dissolution.
E si procezeys del loc del os pessa e pongeys dejos la codena, lahoras tu scindeys sobre lu, e osta le, e fay segon que havem dit en la fractura de la furcula de sadacio de apostema caut si accideys aqui.	And if you proceed from the place of the bone of the foot and place it under the skin, then you cut through it, and hold it, and do as we have said in the fracture of the furcula of sadacio de apostema caut if this happens here.
Capitol .vii.	Chapter VII.
De restauracio de la fractura del pietz.	Of the restoration of the fracture of the chest.
Le pietz alcunas veguadas es romput en le mieg loc de lu e aquo tart endeve; mays las extremitatz de lu mot endeve que so ciccadas e comminuidas.	The chest is broken in some places of it and that ends there; but the extremities of it are not cut and comminuted.
E dels accidentz de lu quan es trencat le mieg de lu es que declina a las partidas dedintz e accideys a lu gran dolor, e dificultat en lo hale, e tos, e fort leu e vomeys sanc; e es declarada en lu cavitat en le os trencat e no es occulta al sentiment.	When the patient's foot is broken, it bends in parts and causes great pain, difficulty in walking, coughing, and severe vomiting and diarrhea; and it is declared in the cavity of the broken bone and is not hidden from sensation.
E la restauracio de lu es que sia resupinat le malaute sobre le sieu dos, e pausa entre las spallas de lu un coyssi; e aprop prem als muscles de lu, e ajusta las costas de lu am las mas de dos costatz, e subtilia te en la operacio de lu e en la equacio segon tota manieyra que es ad aquo possibla e que conveneys ad aquo, entro que retorne la figura del os segon que cove.	The restoration of the bone is that the patient should be placed on their back, and a cushion should be placed between their shoulder blades; and then press on the muscles of the foot, adjust the ribs of the foot to the level of two times the thickness, and gently perform the operation of the bone and its alignment according to all possible methods that are appropriate and convenient until it returns to its original shape.
E aprop pausa sobre lu emplastre e estopa e pausa desobre astela de taula subtil de sauze o de caligi e de a lor semblantz en levitat, pus que tu envolopas aquela en drap; e aprop subtilia te en lian aquela sobre le os trencat que no sia maugut; e vay am liadura segon retonditat al dors alcunas veguadas, e strenh aquel am strictura decent; e aprop considera la liadura en tota hora, e quan es mollificada strenh aquela.	And then place the plaster and bandage over the affected area on a thin tablecloth or cloth, so that you can wrap it in cloth; and gently apply that to the broken bone so that it is not too tight; and then apply some lotion to the back of the hand, and strengthen the bandage with a proper structure; and consider the swelling in the whole hour, and when it becomes soft, strengthen that.
E si necessitat provoca a desliament de aquela deves corrossio o pruziment, o dolor, o apostema que accideysso en le loc, lahoras tu coyta e deslia aquela e erradica le emplastre e rectifique aquo que accideys per aquo am manieyra de curacio de lu; e aprop reduzeys le emplastre, si vezes ad aquo la facia; e ajusta a lu strictura entro que sia sanat.	And if it is necessary to remove the bandage or plaster that has caused pain, swelling, abscess, or infection at that location, then you should remove and discard that one and apply a new ointment to treat the wound; and if you see that it is healing, then adjust the bandage until it is completely healed.
Capitol .viii.	Chapter VIII.
De restauracio de las costas quan son trincadas.	On the restoration of the ribs when they are bruised.
Sapias que fractura de las costas no catz sino en locs grosses que siegon le dos; e de las extremitatz de lor de la partida denant no accideys ad aquelas contricio sino per aquo quar so cartillaginosas.	You should know that rib fractures do not occur except in the larger, thicker ribs that are located on both sides; and at their extremities, near the spine, they do not occur due to contraction but because they are cartilaginous.
E cognicio de lu no es amaguada al sentiment deves la inquisicio de lu am les ditz.	And if you do not know about it, you should not hesitate to ask the doctor about it.
E la restauracio sia ayssi que enguales la fractura am les ditz segon la manieyra possibla, entro que sia engulhat segon que cove, e aprop emplastre e strenh le os trencat am stela, si indigeys de aquel.	And the restoration should be done in such a way that it matches the fracture as much as possible, until it is completely healed, and then apply an ointment and strengthen the broken rib with a bandage or splint according to the doctor's instructions.
E si la fractura de las costas es declinant a las partidas dedintz, lahoras accideys al malaute dolor vehement e punctura, ayssi cum punctura que accideys ad aquel que ha pleureci, e per aquo quar le os ponh le velament; e accideys a lu difficultat de hanelit, e tos, e vomit de mot sanc; e aquesta es de dificil curacio.	If the rib fracture is declining towards the inner parts, the patient experiences severe pain and puncture, similar to the puncture that occurs in someone who has coughed, and because of this, the bones are covered with a cloth; and they experience difficulty in breathing, coughing, and vomiting, and this is difficult to cure.
E ja les Antixs so engeniatz en aquela am motz engientz.	The ancients also had devices for that great purpose.
E de lor so que diso: cove que pauses viandas del malaute que engendro imflacio e ventositat, per que le ventre sia imflat e sia extendut, e la fractura sia impellida a las partidas defora.	They said that coverings placed over the patient's body that cause inflation and ventilation, so that the abdomen is inflated and extended, and the fracture is pushed towards the outer parts.
Mays nos avoreyssem aquo per so que no sia causa leugiera a generar apostema caut, si no accideys; e si ja accideys, lahoras ja ajuda ad aquo.	However, we should avoid this because it may not cause the generation of an abscess, if it does not occur; and if it has already occurred, then we should help with that.
E diyssero alcus de lor que sia pausada desus ventoza e aprop que sucque am fortitut; e es semblant a ratiocinacio, mays empero es temut que la ventoza atire las superfluitatz al loc per la debilitat.	And they said that the covering should be placed above the windpipe and that it should suck strongly; and this is similar to reasoning, but it is feared that the windpipe may draw the excess fluid into the wound due to its weakness.
E diyssero alcus de lor: cove que·l loc sia cubert am lana que ja es submersa en oli caut, e sian pausatz pulvils entre las costas entro que sia umplida, que sia la liadura engual quan envolopas aquela segon retonditat; e aprop sia curat le malaute am curacio de pleuresi de vianda e de medicina.	And they said to them: cover that place with a wool blanket that has already been immersed in hot oil, and place powders between their ribs until it is full, which should be the same thickness as when you wrapped the second bandage; and then cure the patient with the care of pains from food and medicine.
E si causa vehement constrenh le malaute la qual no sufferta, e le os punh le velament am punctura ledent, temem sobre le malaute, lahoras cove que fendam sobre le loc, descubram de la costa trencada, e aprop pausem desobre aquela instrument que conserve le ciphac, la rememoracio del qual es precedida, e que inscidam le os am facilitat, e extraguam aquel.	And if the patient experiences very strong constraint that they have not suffered before, and the bones push the bandage at the puncture, cover over the patient, then cut open the area, revealing the broken rib, and place your hand over that instrument that contains the cipher, the remembrance of which is preceded, and that they should cut the bones to facilitate, and extract it.
E aprop que ajustem las doas labias de la plagua, si es gran, am cozidura, e curem aquela am emplastres entro que sia sanada.	And then adjust the loose lips of the wound, if it is large, with ointment, and cure that with ointments until it is healed.
E si accideys dedintz apostema, lahoras tu coyta e enfon pulvils en oli rozat e pausa sobre le loc, e que sia curat le malaute am aquo que cove a la apostema dedintz.	And if an abscess is formed, then you should cover and insert powders in hot oil and place over the area, and that the patient be cured with that which covers the abscess.
E sia ressupinat sobre le latz sobre le qual dorm, entro que sia sanat.	And let him be placed on his left side while he is sleeping until he is healed.
Capitol .ix.	Chapter 9:
De restauracio de fractura del spondil del dos e del col.	Concerning the recovery of a broken spine of the back and neck.
Alcunas veguadas endeve fractura als osses del col, e tart endeve a lor atricio, e semblantment als spondils del dos.	Sometimes, fractures occur in the bones of the neck and chest, and they are attached to their respective muscles, similarly to the spines of the back.
E cum aquo accideys ad alcu e voles saber si sara sanat o no, lahoras considera, quar si vezes las sieuas mas ja mollificadas e stupefaytas e mortas e no pot maure aquelas ni extendre ni strenher aquelas e quan constrenges aquelas am les tieus ditz o punges aquelas am agulha e no sent en aquelas dolor, lahoras sapias que no es sanat, e en las mes de disposicios es mortal.	And when such an accident occurs to someone and you wish to know whether they will be healed or not, consider this: if the bones are already softened, stupefied, dead, and cannot move or strengthen them, and when you press them with your fingers or prick them with a needle and they do not feel any pain in those places, then know that they are not healed, and in such cases it is mortal.
E si mau aquelas e sent en aquelas constriccio am les ditz e punctura, lahoras sapias que la nucha de l’os es salva e que le malaute guereys am curacio.	And if they feel pain in those places when you press them with your fingers or prick them with a needle, then know that the neck of the bone is saved and that the patient will recover.
E si ve als spondils del col le semblant ad aquo e voles saber si sira sanat o no, lahoras considera als pes de lu.	And if you see similarities in the spines of the neck to what has been described and wish to know whether they will be healed or not, then consider their feet.
Lahoras si tu vezes que so ja mollificatz, accideys ad aquels aquo que es accidit en las mas, e aprop quan jatz sobre le sieu dos, yeys ventozitat e egestio ses la sua volontat, e alcunas veguadas es resupinat sobre le sieu dos e vol urinar e no pot, lahoras sapias que es mortal, e adonc no trebales en la curacio de lu.	When you see that it has already been softened, apply the same remedies that are used for these conditions, and when it is on its side, it becomes difficult to urinate and defecate, and sometimes some people lie on their side and want to urinate but cannot, then know that it is dangerous, and therefore do not treat it.
Mays si no accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, la causa es milhor e pus leugiera.	If none of these causes occur, the cause is better and less severe.
E la curacio de lu es que te perforses a la sedacio del apostema caut que pauses sobre le spondil atrissat oli rozat sol, o am mugols de huous asatz; pausa sobre aquela aquel alcunas veguadas le dia entro que sia sedat le apostema caut.	The treatment of this is that you pierce the abscess with a sharp needle or a lancet dipped in warm oil or some other medicine; place some bandages on it until the abscess is sedated.
E lahoras pausa un dels emplastres confortantz e exsitans, e strenh sobre aquel am liament; e comanda al malaute que use de repaus e de tranquillitat e que no dorme sobre la partida am la qual atroba dolor entro que sia sanat.	And later place one of the healing and existing plasters on it, and strengthen it with a bandage; command the patient to use rest and tranquility and not to sleep on the side where the pain occurs until it is healed.
E si accideys deves la atricio del os satagias o alcuna causa que ja es seperada de lu, lahoras cove que secces sobre la codena e que ostes aquel os; e aprop ajusta las doas labias de la plagua, am sutura si es gran; e aprop cura aquela am alcu encarnatiu dels enguentz, entro que sia sanat.	And if it occurs that the tissue of the bone is separated from it or some other cause that has already been separated from it, then cover it with a bandage and apply some medicine to it; if it is large, use sutures; and later cure it with some ointment containing blood.
Mays si es trencat le derier del os alhoses, e es la fi de la coeta, lahoras cove que tu entrometas le dit pous de la ma senestra en le cul, e que enguales le os trencat am l’autra ma segon que es possible per equacio segonda; e aprop pausa sobre lu emplastre e astelha, si indigeysses de aquels, e aprop strenh aquel.	If the lower back of the spine is fractured, and it is at the end of the coccyx, then insert your left hand into the anus, and equalize the broken bones as much as possible; and place a poultice and bandage on it, if necessary, and strengthen it.
E si sentes satagias trencadas en lu, lahoras tu fen sobre aquela, e osta aquel, e cura la plagua am la curacio que es precedida entro que sia sanada.	And if you feel broken ribs in that area, then perform surgery on it, and remove that, and cure the wound with the treatment that is preceded by it until it is healed.
Capitol .x.	Chapter 10.
De restauracio de la ancha.	Of the restoration of the jaw.
Les osses de las anchas tart so trencats, e si trencan, lahoras la fractura de lor no es sino communicio en las extremitatz de aquelas e son inscidas en la longitut e declinan a las partidas dedintz; e accideys al malaute dolor en le loc e punctura, e la camba es stupefacta quan es fractura.	The bones of the jaws are broken, and if they are broken, then the fracture of those is only communication at their extremities and they are inserted lengthwise and decline to the parts within; and the patient experiences pain in that location and puncture, and the bedcover is stupefied when the fracture occurs.
E la restauracio de lu es que tu extendas la tua ma sobre aquel entro que sia sobre la fractura qual es la figura de lu.	And the restoration of it is that you extend your hand over it so that it is above the fracture, which is its figure.
E si fractura es en la extremitat de lu tant solament, lahoras tu enguala aquela segon que a tu es apparelhat per equacio engual entro que sia asemblat a la sua figura natural.	If the fracture is only at the end of it, then you should apply the second splint that you have available for equality, equal to the length that is necessary to be assembled to its natural figure.
Mays si la fractura es en le lonc o que ja declina a las partidas dejos, lahoras tu fay jaser le malaute sobre le sieu ventre entro que sia preparada a tu la restauracio de aquela fractura.	But if the fracture is long or declines to the parts below, then you should make the patient lie on their stomach until you are prepared for the restoration of that fracture.
E donc quan auras engualada aquela, pausa sobre lu emplastre, e aprop pausa sobre aquel astela de fust o de codena, e strenh per strictura sobre la qual no temas punctacio de fractura ni remocio de la stelha.	And then when you have splinted it, place your hand on that plaster, and also on that star of wood or iron, and strengthen the structure over which you do not fear puncture of the fracture or removal of the star.
E enguala la concavitat am aquo que uempla aquela entro que aquela prengua la strictura segon equalitat, e comanda al malaute que dorma sobre le sieu dos o desobre le sieu costat sa.	And splint the concavity with that which you have placed on it to maintain the structure according to equality, and command the patient to lie on their side or their back.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras tu cessa de extencio de lu e de la sua restauracio entro que sia sedat le apostema caut, e pausa sobre lu aquo que sede aquel segon que es precedit; e aprop retorna a la restauracio de lu, e strenh aquel ayssi cum cove.	But if an abscess occurs, then you should cease from extension of it and its restoration until the abscess is sedated, and place on it that which was previously used; and then return to the restoration of it, and strengthen that which is there with a cover.
E si accideysso en le os satagias o son comminuidas, lahoras tu las tratz.	If the bones of the spine are fractured or broken, then you should treat them.
Capitol .xi.	Chapter XI.
De restauracio de la fractura del adjutori.	On the restoration of the fracture of the humerus.
Adjutori es aquo que es entre le coyde entro al cap de la spalla.	Humerus is that which is between the ribs and the top of the shoulder.
E si es trencat, lahoras la restauracio de lu es en una de doas manieyras, de las quals es la una que tu prenguas fust pla de migiera groceza segon aquesta forma:	And if it is broken, the restoration of it is in one of two ways, the first of which you grab hold of with your hand placed flat on the ground like this:
E sian liatz en doas extremitatz dos liamentz, e aprop sia suspendut del loc elevat.	And if it is attached in two ends of two bands, then suspend it from the elevated position.
E segua le malaute sobre una sezela; e aprop gieta fora le sieu bras trencat sobre le fust entro que pervengua al titillic de lu en le mieg loc del qual sia annexa la curvitat del fust.	And follow the patient on a chair; and then gently extend their broken arm over the flat surface until it reaches the tip of the humerus in the middle position where the curve of the arm is attached.
E aprop suspen sobre aquel alcuna causa greu, o·l minestre extenda aquel a las partidas dejos; e aprop le metge eque la fractura am las sieuas mas ensemps, entro que la fractura retorne segon que cove.	And then suspend some heavy object, or the nurse extends it to its parts; and then the doctor places his hand on both sides of the fracture as soon as the fracture returns to its original position.
E l’autra manieyra es que·l malaute sia ressupinat sobre la sieua cervitz e suspen la ma del col de lu am liament; e aprop comanda a dos ministres que la un de lor tengua aquo que es desobre la fractura am las suas mas; e l’autre tengua le pus dejos de lu; e quascu de lor extenda a la sua partida.	And the other handmaid should place the patient on their side and support their neck with her hand; and then command two ministers that one of them holds what is above the fracture with their hands, and the other holds the other end; and each of them extends their part.
E si voles que la extencio sia pus fort, lahoras tu strenh sobre la fractura am liament e sobre aquela am autre liament, e quascu dels dos ministres extendan a doas suas partidas.	And if you want the extension to be stronger, then press on the fracture with your hand and on the other end with the other hand, and each of the two ministers extends their part.
E donc si la fractura es propinquada a la extremitat del muscle, lahoras cove que sia pausat la mitat del liament sobre le citillic e l’autre dejos la fractura deves le coyde.	And if the fracture is close to the end of the muscle, then place the middle of the cushion on the back and the other behind the fracture on the side.
E semblantment si la fractura es propdana al coyde, lahoras cove que sia pausat le liament sobre aquel loc e sobre aquel coyde.	And similarly, if the fracture is close to the side, then place the cushion on that location and on the side.
Enguala aquela am facilitat e ses trebal, e aprop quant sira engualada segon que cove e es applicada per bona applicacio, lahoras strenh aquela si no accideys apostema caut.	Equalize it with the other and its work, and when it is equalized according to what is covered and applied well, then press on that side if there is no pus infection.
Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras layssa la strictura entro al vii dia, e pausa sobre lu lana sutza enbeguda en vi agre e oli rozat entro que repause le apostema, e lahoras tu stren aquela.	If an abscess occurs, leave the dressing in place until the seventh day, and apply warm compresses over the affected area until the abscess is ready to be opened, and then you should lance it.
E la manieyra de strenher aquela es que pauses emplastre sobre la fractura, e aprop pausa envolopament de drap nau sobre le emplastre; e aprop ajuste le bras sobre aquel adjutori, e pause la sua ma uberta sobre le sieu muscle.	The method of lancing it is to apply plaster over the fracture, and then cover the plaster with a layer of cloth; then place the arm on an assistant, and place your hand on their muscle.
E pausa le drap e strenh sobre le adjutori le bras per so que·l bras sia en loc de stelhas, si no prohibeys de aquo alcuna causa del os trencat.	Then place the cloth and lance over the assistant's arm to keep it in place, so that the arm is not dislocated, unless there is any reason why the broken bone should not be moved.
E lahoras usa de stelhas.	And then use splints.
E es que pauses sobre la fractura aquela stela que sia pus lada e pus fort de las autras stelas; e pausa entre quascuna stela la latitut del dit, e sia la longitut de las stelas segon la trencadura am addicio de tres ditz de tota partida.	And you should place the splint that is closest and strongest to the others over the fracture; and between each splint, leave a space equal to the thickness of the splints, and the length of the splints should be according to the fracture plus three inches on all sides.
E aprop strenh sobre las stelas am la strictura la qual he dita al comensament del capitol.	And then place your hand over the bandage that I mentioned at the beginning of this chapter.
E es que la tua strictura sobre le loc de la fractura sia pus streyt.	And your restriction on the location of the fracture should be as straight as possible.
E quant pus es alonguada la fractura sia la strictura menor.	And when the fracture is more curved, the restriction is less.
E donc si vezes le situament de las stelas e la strictura ayssi cum havem dit en la hora en la qual restauras le membre al sieu assituament, lahoras tu fay.	And if you see the position of the splints and the restriction as we have said at the time when you restore the member to its original position, then do so.
E si temes apostema caut, lahoras tu layssa la strictura e las stelas entro al dia vii ayssi cum havem dit.	And if you fear abscess, then leave the restriction and the splints in place as we have said on day seven.
E aprop considera le liament en totas partidas per tres dias per so que no accida en le loc pruziment o imflacio; o es prohibida la vianda pervenir al membre per disposicio de superfluitat de strictura; e donc rectifiqua tot aquo segon que havem dit.	And then consider the ligament in all its parts for three days to prevent it from occurring in the wrong place or inflammation; or eating is prohibited to reach the member due to the disposition of superfluous restriction; and therefore, correct all this as we have said.
Mays si tu yest sobre confizanssa que no accida alcuna causa de aquo, lahoras no deslias la liguadura sino aprop tres dias o mays.	But if you are sure that no cause of this will occur, then do not remove the ligament for three days or more.
E sia la sua dormicio del malaute sobre le sieu dos, e las sieuas mas sian sobre le stomac.	And the patient's pillow should be on their back, and their hands should be on their stomach.
E pausa sobre le adjutori cocena plena de lana engualment, e considera en tota hora de la nueyt o del dia que no sia deliada ni dissolta la figura del membre trencat, o que sia le liament mollificat, donc rectifica aquo tot am la tua vertut.	And place your hand on the assistant's full apron of wool equally, and consider at all times of night or day that the figure of the broken member is not melted or dissolved, or that the ligament has softened, so correct that also with your skill.
E pausa la vianda del malaute segon le orde le qual havem denant mes, enayssi que la vianda sia subtil en le comensament entro que es comensat strenher; e lahoras cove que egrossas la vianda de lu.	And place the food of the patient according to the order we have given before, in such a way that the food is thin at the beginning until it is started to strengthen; and later cover it with a cloth.
Quar de constuma del adjutori e de la camba de lu es que sian strengutz en xl dias; e lahoras cove que sian desliatz e sia administrat banh e sia medicat am enguentz los quals rectifican aquel.	Because the assistant and the pillow of the patient are usually strengthened in ten days; and later cover it with a cloth, wash it, administer it, and medicate it with the ointments that correct that.
E si la fractura es layha atrita, lahoras tu no deslies de aquela le liament e las stelhas entro a l dias o entro a dos meses.	And if the fracture is delayed in healing, then do not remove the ligament and the splints within ten days or two months.
Capitol .xii.	Chapter XII.
De restauracio de fractura del bras.	Of the restoration of a broken arm.
Bras es compost de dos osses les quals so appelatz dos focils; dels quals la un es petit, e es aquel que siec le dit pous, e l’autre es gran e es aquel le qual es pausat dejos le petit dit, de la partida pus dejus.	An arm is composed of two bones, which are called the radius and ulna; one is small, and that is the one that goes to the wrist, and the other is large and that is the one that is placed behind the small one from the elbow joint.
E fort leu es trencat le focil major solament, o le petit, e fort leu son trincatz ensemps.	And if the main or small intestine is severely burned alone, or together, they are often severely damaged.
E quan es trencat le focil petit desus, lahoras la restauracio de lu es leugiera, e la sanacio de lu es pus leugiera.	And when the small intestine is burned above, its repair is less likely, and its healing is more difficult.
E quan es trencat le focil de lu dejos la fractura de lu es mala, e la sanacio de lu es dificil.	And when the intestine is burned below the fracture, its healing is bad, and its healing is difficult.
E pus mala de aquela es quan son trencatz dos osses essemps.	Even worse than that is when two bones are broken together.
Donc si l’os le qual es trencat es le focil petit desus, lahoras es convenient al metge, deves la restauracio de lu, que pauze petita extencio am facilitat entro que aquel sia engualhat.	Therefore, if the bone that is broken above the small intestine, it is advisable for the doctor to facilitate its healing by keeping a short distance between them.
Mays si le focil gran es aquo que es trincat, lahoras cove que pause extencio pus vehement.	But if the large intestine is that which is burned, then it is advisable to keep a longer distance between them.
E si les dos focils so ensemps trincatz, lahoras cove que tu pauses la extritura mot pus fort.	And if both intestines are burned together, then it is advisable to keep a very strong distance between them.
E cove que pauses la figura de la ma deves la restauracio de lu e la extencio de lu estenduda sobre un coyssi, e sia le pols de la ma a las partidas desus, pus aut que totz les autres ditz, e le dit auricular sia pus bas dels autres ditz, e le malaute sia cezent sobre una cezela cayrada.	And it is advisable to place the hand of the patient over the intestine and extend it on a cushion, with the arm of the patient below, higher than all the others, and the ear should be lower than all the others, and the patient should lie on a pillow that has been placed.
E sia un coyssi denant lu en la altetut o endreyt de lu, per so que·l malaute no encorra trebalh.	And place a cushion under their head or back, so that the patient does not move too much.
E aprop le ministre extenda le bras de la partida pus dejos am la sieua ma o am liament, e autre ministre extenda desus semblantment.	And the assistant should extend their arm on the side farthest from the patient's head or chest, and another assistant should do the same on the opposite side.
E aprop le metge engualhe le os entro que redugua aquel segon la milhor figura que pot.	And the doctor should straighten the bones as much as possible according to the best figure they can.
E si en la factura del os so satagias, lahoras te perforsa raduzir tota pessa en le sieu loc am la tua vertut.	And if there are staggers in the bone fracture, then carefully remove all of it from its original location with your skill.
E si appar en lu satagia separada que punh la codena e no es a tu speransa en la restauracio de lu, lahoras tu fen sobre lu e osta aquela segon la manieyra la qual havem dita desus.	And if the stagger appears separate and pulls the string and does not respond to your hopes of restoring it, then do something on it and follow the method we mentioned above.
Mays si la fractura es am plagua, yeu ja he fayt ad aquo capitol singular, e donc pren la curacio de aquel.	But if the fracture is in the middle, you have already treated something like that, and then take care of that cure.
E si accideys apostema caut al comensament de la tua restauracio, lahoras tu lineys un drap am cerot fayt de oli rozat e cera blanca, e sia migier entre specitut e subtilitat, e strenh drap sobre aquel am strictura subtil entro que le apostema sia cedat; e lahoras remau le cerot e pausa emplastre preparat de polvera de moli am clayre de huou, e aprop pausa stelhas; e sia la stela la qual es pauzada sobre aquela fractura pus lada e pus fort.	And if an abscess occurs at the beginning of your restoration, then you should apply a cloth made of roasted oil and white wax, and it should be between specificity and subtlety, and a strong cloth over that subtle structure until the abscess is cured; and then remove the poultice and place a prepared powder of ground mold and clear hoove, and place splints. And the cloth that is placed over that fracture should be the strongest one.
E sapias que·l nombre de las stelas del bras so vi en las majors disposicios, o sia la fractura en un focil o en dos focils ensemps.	And you know that the number of bones in the arm is in the major dispositions, or if it is a fracture in one phalanx or two at once.
E aprop pausa la tua strictura sobre le loc de la fractura pus fort e pus vehement, e quan mays sira la extrictura a las partidas desus de la fractura o a las partidas pus bassas de lu, pausa la strictura un pauc pus molh segon que es precedida la rememoracio de lu en le comensament del capitol.	And then place your bandage over the location of the fracture as strongly and as tightly as possible, and when the bandage is more than a span above or below the fracture, place the bandage more loosely according to the previous remembrance in the beginning of the chapter.
E les draps que so envolopatz sobre la fractura sian draps mols humitz, e no sian durs ni aspres, e·l fiel am le qual es strenhut sia de li propriament migier entre subtil e gros, ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And the cloths that are wrapped around the fracture should be soft cloths, and not hard or sharp, and the best one is the one that is strengthened just enough to move between being subtle and thick, as we have recommended.
E considera le membre e·l liament aprop alcus dias.	And consider the member and the limb close by for several days.
E si accideys alcuna causa de la qual rectificacio es necessaria, ayssi cum prusiment le qual accideys al membre, e lahoras cove que tu enbroques le membre am aygua cauda entro que cesse aquel pruziment.	And if there is any cause for which correction is necessary, as when the member itself is affected, and then make sure that you put the member in water before the problem stops.
E leysses le membre no costreyt entro que repause, e aprop torna la strictura.	And do not force the member until it relaxes, and then return the bandage.
E si la extrictura ja es mollificada e l’os ja es remaugut e semblantz ad aquels, lahoras rectifiqua tot aquo am la tua vertut.	If the constriction has already softened and the bone has been reunited and similar to those, then straighten everything with your skill.
E considera mays si le nutriment es prohibit pervenir al membre per superfluitat de strictura, quar lahoras cove que mollifiques aquel un petit e laysses aquel per alcus dias entro que corra ad aquel le nutriment, e aprop strenh aquel.	And consider more if the nourishment is prohibited from reaching the member due to excessive constriction, then gradually soften that one a little and leave it for a few days until the nourishment can reach it, and then strengthen it.
Mays si al malaute no accideys alcuna causa de aquelas que havem ditas, lahoras no cove que sia desliat entro aprop xx dias o enviro de aquels.	But if the patient does not experience any of those causes that we have mentioned, then do not let it be discharged within the next 20 days or around those times.
E aprop sia suspenduda la ma del malaute per la sua vertut de movement agitatius, e fay aquel dormir sobre le sieu dos.	And let the hand of the patient be suspended over them for their skill in moving and make them sleep on their side.
E sapias que aquesta fractura es restaurada en xxx dias o en xxxii dias, o fort leu es restaurada en xxviii dias, e tot aquo es segon la disposicio de las compleccios e las disposicios de la vertut.	And know that this fracture is restored in 30 days or in 42 days, or if it is strong, it is restored in 28 days, and all of this depends on the constitution of the body and the disposition of the skill.
Capitol .xiii.	Chapter 13.
De restauracio de fractura de la pinche de la ma e dels ditz.	Of the restoration of the fracture of the hand and its fingers.
Sapias que a la pinche de la ma e als nuzes dels ditz tart endeve fractura, e no accideys a lor sino atricio motas veguadas.	When the bone of the wrist and the joints of the said hand are broken, do not move them, but only slightly move them in order to prevent them from becoming displaced.

Mays si la fractura es a las partidas defora, lahoras cove que pauses desus stela e autre estela de la partida dejos en la palma, per so que la ma sia uberta e dreyta; e aprop pausa la strictura, ayssi cum es revolvuda la ma a la rateta entre les ditz am liamentz. E si accideys fractura a alcu dels nozes dels ditz, lahoras si es le dit pous, sia engualat segon que cove e aprop sia strenhut am la palma e si·t voles, pausa a lu astela petita dreyta per so que sia elevada la fractura e no sia mauguda.	And if the fracture occurs in any of the bones of the aforementioned parts, then if it is possible, apply a bandage as soon as possible to the palm and if desired, place a small, dry dressing on it so that the fracture is elevated and not moistened.

If the fracture is in the other aforementioned parts, such as in the wrist, elbow, ear, or ring finger, then apply a bandage as soon as possible to the same part; or all of them at once, which is better; or place a small, dry dressing on it, as we have said in the forearm.

Capitol .xiv.	Chapter 14.
De restauracio de fractura del os de la coyssa.	Of the restoration of a broken bone in the thigh.
Le os de la cueyssa motas veguadas es trencat e es declarat al sentiment segon que es convertit a la partida denant e a la pus sobirana.	The bones of the thigh are broken and are declared to be fractured when they are converted into the part that is highest and most prominent.
E la restauracio de lu se fa enayssi que·l liament es strenhut sobre la fractura e autre liament dejos la fractura, e le malaute sia prostrat sobre le sieu ventre e sobre la cara. E aprop le ministre extenda tot le liament a la sua partida segon la qualitat, quan la fractura es en le mieg loc del os.	Then the healer extends the ligament to its entire length according to its quality, when the fracture is in the middle of the bone.

E aprop le metge enguale le os am amduas las sieuas mas entro que reduzesca aquel segon la semblansa natural e l’os es conjungit per bona conjunccio; lahoras cove que pauses emplastre e strictura, si no accideys al membre apostema. La strictura de lu sia ayssi fayta: cove que envolopes sobre la fractura una benda dura, e dobla aquela dos o tres veguadas, e remaugua de lu superfluitat; e aprop envolopa la camba entro que pervengua al talo e a la razitz de la cueyssa.	The structure of the fracture is as follows: a callus that covers the fracture, bends it twice or three times, and remains above; then cover the area where it reaches the ankle and the back of the thigh.
E intromet lonc fiel entre la cueyssa e la camba prop del denol a las partidas dejos, e venguan las extremitatz del fiel de la partida pus sobirana de las doas partz, e aprop revolveys sobre la camba e la cueyssa aquo que superflueys de la benda. Then begin to apply the fracture strongly from the middle over the area of the fracture with three or four layers, and as you approach the edge of the fracture area, your fracture should be smaller and more flexible and wetter.
E aprop exten a doas extremitatz del fiel a las partidas dejos entro que pervengua a la cavilha del pe, e strenh amdoas las extremitatz de las stelhas del autra part per so que·l liament no sia remaugut del sieu loc.	And then approach the two extremities of the patient to the parts where it reaches the cavity of the foot, and strengthen both extremities of the bones of the other part so that the ligament is not left in its place.
E aprop leyssa la strectura sobre aquel, don esta ayssi que no accideys al membre corrosio ni apostema caut ni emflacio e semblantz ad aquels; e si accideys alcuna causa de aquelas, adonc cueta te am desliament de lu, e rectifica aquo que accideys tot aprop, segon que havem dit motas veguadas.	And then place the structure over that, where there is no risk of corrosion, abscess, inflammation, and similar to those; and if any cause of those occurs, then count that you have removed it from there, and rectify what has happened as soon as possible, according to what we have said before.
Mays si en le os es pessa del os la qual pongua, lahoras cove que tu engualhes aquel segon que a tu es possibla; e sino, fen sobre lu e remau aquel, e cura am aquo del qual es precedida la rememoracio entro que sia sanat.	However, if the bone that is broken is in the place where it should be, then try to align it as much as possible; and if not, perform surgery on it and replace it, and heal the wound from which the previous memory was made before it is healed.
E alcunas veguadas es strenhuda aquesta fractura de la coyssa otra aquo que sian ajustadas a lu stelhas, ayssi cum havem dit en le adjutori e·n le bras.	And some of these fractures are strengthened by this bone or another that is adjusted to the bones, as we have said in the assistant and the arm.

Capitol .xvi.	Chapter XVI.
De restauracio de la fractura de la camba.	Of the restoration of the fracture of the ribs.
Sapias que en la camba so dos osses dels quals la un es gros, e es le nompnat per nom de la camba; e l’autra es subtil, e es nompnat focil.	You should know that in the ribs there are two bones, one of which is large and is called the rib, and the other is thin and is called the sternum.

E aprop envolopa sobre quascuna drap en doas envolucios segon la longitut de lu, e pausa la una sobre la partida de la camba de la una part e l’autra del autra part, e sian del denol entro al pus bas loc del pe.	And then wrap it around each piece of cloth in two folds according to its length, and place one on the side of the leg on one side and the other on the other side, and it should be from the denuded part up to the lowest part of the foot.

And then consider the bed in each day and study what happens behind it, and keep it away from abscesses and inflammation or other similar causes; and if something happens of those, then pause at that moment until it is healed.
Capitol .xvii.	Chapter 17.
De la fractura del talo e dels osses del pe e dels ditz.	Of the fracture of the talus and bones of the foot and those called.

And it is important for you to remember that you should consider all the causes that have been mentioned to you in the other fractures of the accidents we have discussed; and pause at every accident, what covers it.
Capitol .xviii.	Chapter 18.
De fractura del conh de la femna e del os del pentenilh e de la vergua del home.	Of the fracture of the thigh bone, the patella, and the kneecap of the man.

Capitol .xix.	Chapter 19.
De restauracio de fractura dels osses quan es am plagua.	Of the restoration of bone fractures when they are broken in two.
Convenient es ad aquel al qual accideys fractura am plagua, e majorment si le os es gran ayssi cum es le os de la cuoyssa o de l’adjutori, o semblant ad aquel, que tu te cuoytes e fleubotomes aquel tantost si las condicios de fleubotomia a tu o testifican ayssi cum desus havem dit. Mays si accideys apostema caut, lahoras tu layssa la restauracio de lu entro al ix dia, entro que sia cedat le apostema, e no apropinques a lu en le tertz dia e·l iiii de tot, quar tu faras accidir mals accidentz. Mays si extencio no es a tu preparada e la equacio de lu am las tieuas mas, lahoras tu reduzeys aquel am las tuas mas am aquest sturment; e es sturment le qual es fayt de ferr, la longitut del qual es de vii ditz o de viii e la latitut del qual es segon la quantitat de la plagua; e per aquo es necessari al metge que prengua de aquels tres o quatre segon la quantitat que indigeys ad aquo en la curacio en tota specia de fractura.	However, if the extension is not at your disposal and the equality of it with your hands is not possible, then reduce it with this instrument; and this instrument is made of iron, the length of which is seven or eight palms, and its width is according to the size of the wound; and for that reason, it is necessary for the doctor who uses those three or four according to the amount needed in the cure in all cases of fracture.
E sia redon, e sia en lu pauca groceza per so que no sia doblat deves la comprecio sobre aquel en la hora de la operacio.	And make sure it is level, and keep it from being folded in the middle during the operation.
E sia de aguda extremitat al qual sia marge en las sieuas extremitatz; e sia le desus de lu a grossetut tendent, e de la maytat de lu entro a las partidas.	And it should be sharp at the tip where it meets the patient's own extremities; and its underside should be thickest at the bottom, and its upper side should enter into the parts.
E aquesta es la forma de lu:	This is the shape of it:
E es nompnat en grec “labre volentz atelarem”, so es paleta pauca.	And it is called in Greek "labrys volente atelarem", so this is its name.
